name: Safor Ali
bio: A visionary leader committed to social change, Safor Ali established the foundation to serve underprivileged communities and create lasting impact.

name: Amirul Islam
bio: With over 15 years of experience in community development, Rahim brings strategic vision and operational expertise to the foundation.

name: Tajul Islam
bio: Fatima oversees the day-to-day operations of the foundation, ensuring every program runs efficiently and reaches its intended beneficiaries.

name: Kamal Hossain
bio: As treasurer, Kamal ensures financial transparency and accountability in all foundation activities and fund management.

name: Nasreen Akter
bio: Nasreen leads our education initiatives, designing programs that provide quality learning opportunities for underserved children.

name: Mizanur Rahman
bio: Mizanur connects the foundation with local communities, identifying needs and building partnerships for greater impact.
